title: Jan. 6 Rioter Gets 5 Yearsâ€™ Probation as Judge Cites Autism Diagnosis
description: Nicholas Rodean broke two window panes with a flagpole and was one of the first to enter the Capitol, federal prosecutors said. He was ordered to spend 240 days in home detention and pay $2,048.
dc:creator: April Rubin

media:content.media:credit: Jason Andrew for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A mob egged on by President Trump stormed the U.S. Capitol on Jan 6.
